org.openimaj.aop

Class MultiTransformClassFileTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.aop.MultiTransformClassFileTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassFileTransformer, javassist.Translator

    public class MultiTransformClassFileTransformer
extends Object
implements ClassFileTransformer, javassist.Translator
    A ClassFileTransformer that applies one or more ClassTransformers to a class before it is loaded.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
